description:
Compact, reliable, and easy to use, the CT-5 is a palm-sized chain tool with the quality Park Tool is known for.

  • Works on derailleur chain including 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11, and 12-speed chains
  • Shelf for loosening tight links
  • Dimensions are 60mm tall, 55mm wide and 15mm thick
name: Park Tool CT-5 Mini Chain Brute Chain Tool
